content.raw:
Is there some recommendation for docker users?

`./run.bash osrf/subt-virtual-testbed:cloudsim_sim_latest cloudsim_sim.ign circuit:=cave worldName:=simple_cave_01 robotName1:=X1F200L robotConfig1:=ROBOTIKA_X2_SENSOR_CONFIG_1`

results into

```
[Dbg] [Manager.cc:809] Loading plugin. Name[ignition::launch::GazeboServer] File[libignition-launch-gazebo.so]
[Msg] Recording to [/tmp/ign/logs]
[Err] [SystemPaths.cc:447] Could not resolve file [simple_cave_01.sdf]
[Msg] Loading SDF world file[].
[Dbg] [Manager.cc:809] Loading plugin. Name[ignition::launch::GazeboGui] File[libignition-launch-gazebogui.so]
Error [parser.cc:670] Could not find model.config or manifest.xml for the model
Error [parser.cc:340] File [] doesn't exist.
[Err] [Server.cc:144] Error Code 1 Msg: Unable to read file:
```

i.e. similar failure I have seen on CloudSim on the very first run??

thanks

Martin

p.s. I am using the latest dockers \(release 2020-03-23\)
